item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Maria My mission is to bring you the power of coaching, mindfulness and neuroscience and partner together to build the life you want to live. I have a Master of Science in Computer Science, am a Master NeuroMindfulness© Coach Practitioner, and am an ICF ACC certified Professional Coach. Education in progress ◦ ICF-Professional Certified Coach (PCC) in progress ◦ Yoga Teacher Training 200h 2022 ◦ ICF-Associate Certified Coach (ACC) 2022 ◦ Certified Scrum Professional®-ScrumMaster (CSP®-SM) 2022 ◦ NeuroMindfulness® Master Coach Practitioner Certification 2020 ◦ ICAgile Certified Professional ◦ Agile Coaching 2020 ◦ Agile Team Facilitation ACP-ATF 2016 ◦ Master of Science, Computer Science ◦ grade 110/110 Contacts Twitter: @mchietera LinkedIn
